meaningMnemonic: Who loves their <radical>flag</radical>, using <radical>jackhammer</radical>s, and precise <radical>measurement</radical>s? Your <kanji>military officer</kanji>! He's always saluting the flag, jackhammering near all the new recruits to test them, and checking the measurement between the floor and their pants. Who else could it be?
readingMnemonic: That <kanji>military officer</kanji>'s favorite bird is an <reading>ea</reading>gle (い)! That should be obvious because the eagle is the bird of America! And that's the country he fights for!
